item.title: Kisir
item.description: Ingredients (2 persons) 100g bulgur 1/2 onion, finely diced 1/2 cucumber, remove seeds, finely diced 1 tomato, finely diced 1 Tbsp tomato paste 1 Tbsp pepperbell paste 2 Tbsp olive oil a squirt of lemon juice 1 Tbsp paprika To serve fresh parsley Instructions Add bulgur to a pot, add already boiled water until water rose 2cm above bulgur Heat up a pan, saute the onion with some oil Add pepperbell and tomato paste to the pan Deglaze with some water Add content of pan to the bulgur Remove the seeds from the cucumber and dice it to cubes After bulgur has cooled down, add the diced tomato, cucumber and lemon juice Add salt, pepper and paprika Serve with chopped parsley

item.title: Lentil Salad
item.description: Ingredients (2 persons) 100g lentils (green or brown) handful of cherry tomatoes 1-2 spring onions optional: feta For the sauce: 1 ts honey 1,5 Tbsp olive oil 1,5 Tbsp balsamico mustard a squirt of lemon juice Instructions Add lentils to water, bring to boil, simmer for around 20m-30m In the meantime, quarter all cherry tomatoes, chop spring onions to rings Mix the ingredients for the sauce After the lentils are done, add everything together, add salt & pepper

item.title: Korean Cucumber Salad
item.description: Ingredients 2 Servings 1 big cucumber 1 Tbsp salt 2 cloves garlic 1 spring onion 1 Tbsp soy sauce 2 Tbsp rice vinegar 1 tabespoon sugar 1 tabespoon sesame seeds 1 ts chili flakes 1 ts sesame oil Instructions Wash cucumber, remove skin if desired. Cut it to small pieces and put it in a bowl with 1 Tbsp of salt and leave it for 20m Roast sesame seeds in a frying pan without any oil Chop spring onion and cut garlic and add with all the other ingredients in a bowl Wash the cucumber thouroughly, there should be no salt left Add the cucumber to the bowl, sprinkle with the roasted sesame seeds
